title: 131 Dan Barber, Great flavour, health benefits and healthy ecosystems can only come from healthy soils not a lab
subtitle: 131 Dan Barber, Great flavour, health benefits and healthy ecosystems can only come from healthy soils not a lab
summary:
Dan Barber, chef and co-owner of Blue Hill, both in NY and Stone Barn, and co-founder of Row 7 Seed Company, joins us to talk about the role of seeds and chefs in regeneration, and where to invest in order to win while helping the environment.
